alert.note: Alert for Western Columbia River Gorge (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 17 at 3:17PM PST until January 17 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Significant icing. Additional ice accumulations of a up to a tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, Western Columbia River Gorge. In Washington, Western Columbia River Gorge. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
